ValidationRule.description: When the Status of the case is "Closed", the Closure Code is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed'), OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(Closure_Code__c)), LEN(Closure_Details__c) = 0 ), AND ( TEXT(Closure_Code__c)!= 'Invalid Enquiry', TEXT(Closure_Code__c)!= 'Redirected Agent Enquiry', TEXT(Closure_Code__c)!= 'Public - No Further Action' )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Closure Code and Closure Details are required when Status is "Closed".
